
Hackers intercepted two messages encrypted with RSA moduli sharing a prime. Can you recover the flag from ciphertext1: 6980826115249545565057827240333134875388216730620316426113740663469792785975362612296246273438144973508966689167658298882832178319734186745029779095955255, ciphertext2: 5679054930057871753229745357601834662123693455013464438846196653276859894299695456386845326971482778093349577392099548562737249234109415834545616214690514?


The flag format is flag{...}
n1=7028802429387037732287119531423925020951468519773019090656601577144190690223971578288803935610965650247397568616554647712556188060666654818328318396138707, n2=7011230677470903917184094698766134073479059905600937960282879572295517906999625548367222229380966042226905186168000084068654520625741987070572223446150663, e=4823277259904784774213285291852102089882584484749414416612496072243940324159945235862762410618276987062669729784111994809639345725468054928623921375990237

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{wyg7j0hh}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: ciphertext1: 6980826115249545565057827240333134875388216730620316426113740663469792785975362612296246273438144973508966689167658298882832178319734186745029779095955255, ciphertext2: 5679054930057871753229745357601834662123693455013464438846196653276859894299695456386845326971482778093349577392099548562737249234109415834545616214690514
vulnerability: common factors
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common factor, computing GCD(n1, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n1=7028802429387037732287119531423925020951468519773019090656601577144190690223971578288803935610965650247397568616554647712556188060666654818328318396138707, n2=7011230677470903917184094698766134073479059905600937960282879572295517906999625548367222229380966042226905186168000084068654520625741987070572223446150663, e=4823277259904784774213285291852102089882584484749414416612496072243940324159945235862762410618276987062669729784111994809639345725468054928623921375990237
extra_info: p=60898132335785248152933878528844067829936609490483739383239709154321161266057, q=115419014669136899799223235896003285068044274433112389060279388480470894371451, r=60745889206986189794293862054646280654768660501837390806074774572147246211813, φ(n1)=7028802429387037732287119531423925020951468519773019090656601577144190690223795261141799013463013493132972721263656666828632591932223135720693526340501200, φ(n2)=7011230677470903917184094698766134073479059905600937960282879572295517906999449383463346106291372525128954536602277271133719570845875632907519605305567400
subtype: common_factors
archetype: rsa
